text: Pathien'n nang a koi han suoka om mo ni ni? Asa, mindon no roh; hannirese, jôkna zora na manin chu mang roh.7:21: aniatachu nangman jôkna rang zorânchum no dônin chu, mang roh; aninônchu hannirese jôkna rang zorânchum na manin chu, mang inla; manêk han suoka no om ha ne theidôr song rangin thang roh.
